thread.title: Ground News - Expert breaks down the role AI will play in 2024 job market
thread.title_full: Ground News - Expert breaks down the role AI will play in 2024 job market

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Expert breaks down the role AI will play in 2024 job market
text:
Summary by Ground News Experts say more employers are leaning on AI to help fill positions. Dr. Chrissann Ruehele is a professor in the College of Business at Florida Gulf Coast University. She says it's a move that companies are making to streamline the hiring process. But she added that companies have to be mindful of how they're programming the AI. Share menu More

abc Action News Center High Factuality Corporation: E. W. Scripps Company Expert breaks down the role AI will play in 2024 job market If you're looking for a job in the new year, experts say more employers are leaning on AI to help fill positions."So, a lot of organizations are using AI in various to help with the hiring process," said Dr. Chrissann Ruehle.Dr. Ruehele is a professor in the College of Business at Florida Gulf Coast University and Artificial Intelligence Consultant & Researcher. And according to her, this hiring trend ranges from employers using AI to help scan …
